events.description: A courier from the Sunlit Assembly arrives with news of a spreading fever among pilgrims.
Iron Syndicate loses an ingot shipment; suspicion falls on river smugglers.
Verdant Circle scouts spot black sap seeping near the old stones, marking the grove's decline.
events.trigger: travel through forest or downtime research

events.description: Assembly lantern dims and casts two shadows, hinting at a rival faith's interference.
events.trigger: visit to shrine or completion of an Assembly favor

events.description: A rival adventuring party claims to have solved the ingot theft; their story conflicts with known facts.
events.trigger: when players ignore the docks for two scenes

events.description: Representatives from all four factions meet at dawn to bargain; outcomes depend on reputation and clocks.
events.trigger: after any clock fills or is reduced

advancement.downtime: Advance timeline by at least one event every two downtime scenes; log with [timeline:advance].
advancement.travel: Long journeys that consume a full day advance to the next chronological event.
advancement.branching: If events are skipped, mark them as delayed and adjust triggers rather than deleting them.
